text: The ECJ version referenced by the current Eclipse .classpath resource on trunk is 3.6.2.  The reference Ant build uses ECJ 3.7.
creator: ian@ianbrandt.com
ian@ianbrandt.com
text:
Created attachment 27299
Patch to correct the Eclipse .classpath ECJ version.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the patch.

This has been fixed in trunk and will be included in 7.0.20 onwards.
